data.meaning_mnemonic: Your <radical>spirit</radical> should feel <radical>humble</radical> before a <kanji>god</kanji>'s <kanji>spirit</kanji>. You never really feel humble in front of anyone else, but if you meet a god's spirit… Well, you should probably lower yourself appropriately. Gods have powerful spirits.
data.meaning_hint: Imagine a spirit appearing before you. It's a god. You should be as humble as possible. Out of respect and also because you don't want to be cursed or something.
data.reading_mnemonic: When you meet a <kanji>god</kanji>'s <kanji>spirit</kanji>, you need to get down on your <reading>shin</reading>s (しん). Get down on your ankles? No, not low enough. Knees? No, no, get your shins flat on the ground to show how humble you really are. Luckily, you're wearing <reading>jean</reading>s (じん), so at least that will stop your poor shins getting chafed!
data.reading_hint: If you don't get down on your shins before god's spirit, it could take them away. Even your jeans couldn't protect you then. You don't want to live a shin-less life, do you?
